001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LogicalDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
012
013import java.util.Arrays;
014
015public class AdalineMain {
016
017    public static void main(String[] args) {
018        DataSet dataSet = LogicalDataSets.toMinusSet(new LinesAndCircles().load());
019        DataSet trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
020        DataSet testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
021
022        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(400, 8);
023        ObjectiveFunction objective = Losses.mSE();
024        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.01f);
025        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100).reportObjective().online();
026        Trainer<Adaline> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
027        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
028
029        for (DataSet.Sample sample : testSet) {
030            boolean[] estimate = adaline.classify(sample.features());
031            boolean[] booleans = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs());
032            if (Arrays.equals(booleans, estimate)) {
033                System.out.println("Match! " + Arrays.toString(estimate));
034            } else {
035                System.out.println("MISS: real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate));
036            }
037        }
038    }
039
040}
